actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs..

official_title: A bill to establish in the State of California the Santa Monica Mountain and Seashore National Urban Park.

summary.text: Establishes in the State of California the Santa Monica Mountain and Seashore National Urban Park. Establishes a Santa Monica Mountain and Seashore National Urban Park Commission to assist the Secretary of the Interior in carrying out the objectives of this Act. Provides that the commission shall cease to exist 9 years after the establishment of the Park unless the Secretary extends the commission. Authorizes the appropriation of $30,000,000 each for fiscal years 1974 and 1975, and authorizes reserved appropriations for fiscal year 1976 and each fiscal year thereafter to carry out the objectives of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to establish in the State of California the Santa Monica Mountain and Seashore National Urban Park.
